activities:
Intetics Co. is a leading global sourcing company focused on establishing and operating remote dedicated teams for application development, systems integration, engineering, data processing and back office support.
Intetics does not directly engage in collection or processing of personal data, but may obtain such information while performing work for our clients. The projects that Intetics engages in are of the following nature: online reservation systems, service order management systems, sites for procurement and customization of medical equipment, training systems, and other systems, which require user registration and provide for storage of user data. During the process of software development and testing, we may obtain access to production databases, which store such information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any personal data in electronic or paper form received from customers or prospective customers located in the EU or the EEA
